amendment.description: Page 5, line 16, insert after "reviews." the following: "During the two-year period prior to the inclusion of an individual on a list of candidates under this subparagraph, the individual may not have been a registered lobbyist under the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 (2 U.S.C. 1601 et seq.).". Page 6, after line 6, insert the following new paragraph: ***.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Cummings.
